Inglewood.Graziadio School of Business and Managem: The Graziadio School of Business and Management (GSBM), also known as, Pepperdine Graziadio Business School or the Graziadio School, is the graduate school of business at Pepperdine University in Malibu, California. The school offers MBA, MS and executive degree programs. It is one of the largest graduate business schools in Southern California with more than 44,000 alumni, and is accredited by the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business (AACSB).
